scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run build-literal
scripts.compile: npm run compile:full && npm run compile:ws && npm run compile:http
scripts.compile:ws: wasm-pack build --release --target deno --out-name index --out-dir compiled/ws --no-default-features --features protocol-ws,rustls
scripts.compile:http: wasm-pack build --release --target deno --out-name index --out-dir compiled/http --no-default-features --features protocol-http,rustls
